object.description: Creature has Fear - 0 towards Elves.
object.name: Afraid - Elves

object.description: Add Agility Bonus to the SL for any Swim Tests. Can move through water with full Movement speed.
object.name: Amphibious

object.description: Add Agility Bonus to the SL for and Climb or Stealth Tests
object.name: Arboreal

object.description: Creature does not like Elves.
object.name: Animosity - Elves

object.description: Extra 1 AP on all Hit Locations.
object.name: Armour 1

object.description: If the creature has more Advantage than its opponent, it is Immune to Psychology.
object.name: Belligerent

object.description: The creature gains a Broken Condition if struck by it. It defends only with Dodge. If it loses more than half its Wounds, it will attempt to Flee. If protecting young or Territorial it enters Frenzy instead.
object.name: Bestial

object.description: Large variation of is species. Gains +10 S +10 T, and -5 Ag.
object.name: Big

object.description: Can spend 1 Advantage to make a Free Attack inflicting 1 damage (no extra Strength Bonus).
object.name: Bite 1

object.description: Creature can enact Rhya Blessings.
object.name: Blessed - Rhya

object.description: Double movement when Charging or Running. Can ignore terrain obstacles.
object.name: Bounce

object.description:
For 2 Advantage activate Breath Free Attack. Target 1 opponent within 20+TB yards. All characters within SB yards and all characters between the on the path to the target are struck. Perform an Opposed Ballistic Skill/Dodge Test against all affected targets. Whoever fails, takes 1 Damage. 
Cold effect: Targets gain a Stunned Condition for every full 5 Wounds suffered (minimum of 1).
object.name: Breath Cold 1

object.description:
For 2 Advantage activate Breath Free Attack. Target 1 opponent within 20+TB yards. All characters within SB yards and all characters between the on the path to the target are struck. Perform an Opposed Ballistic Skill/Dodge Test against all affected targets. Whoever fails, takes 1 Damage. 
Corrosion effect: Armour and Weapons carried by affected targets suffer 1 Damage.
object.name: Breath Corrosion 1

object.description:
For 2 Advantage activate Breath Free Attack. Target 1 opponent within 20+TB yards. All characters within SB yards and all characters between the on the path to the target are struck. Perform an Opposed Ballistic Skill/Dodge Test against all affected targets. Whoever fails, takes 1 Damage. 
Fire effect: This attack ignores APs. Affected targets gain Ablaze Condition.
object.name: Breath Fire 1

object.description:
For 2 Advantage activate Breath Free Attack. Target 1 opponent within 20+TB yards. All characters within SB yards and all characters between the on the path to the target are struck. Perform an Opposed Ballistic Skill/Dodge Test against all affected targets. Whoever fails, takes 1 Damage. 
Electricity effect: This attack ignores APs. Affected targets gain Stunned Condition.
object.name: Breath Electricity 1

object.description:
For 2 Advantage activate Breath Free Attack. Target 1 opponent within 20+TB yards. All characters within SB yards and all characters between the on the path to the target are struck. Perform an Opposed Ballistic Skill/Dodge Test against all affected targets. Whoever fails, takes 1 Damage. 
Poison effect: This attack ignores APs. Affected targets gain Poisoned Condition.
object.name: Breath Poison 1

object.description:
For 2 Advantage activate Breath Free Attack. Target 1 opponent within 20+TB yards. All characters within SB yards and all characters between the on the path to the target are struck. Perform an Opposed Ballistic Skill/Dodge Test against all affected targets. Whoever fails, takes 1 Damage. 
Smoke effect: The area fills with smoke, blocking Line of Sight
for TB Rounds.
object.name: Breath Smoke 1

object.description: Gain +10 to Strength and Toughness. Lose -1 Movement and -10 Agility
object.name: Brute

object.description: When defending in melee, if the creature wins an Opposed Test, it causes Damage as if it were the attacker.
object.name: Champion

object.description:
For 2 Advantage, the creature can use Action to perform an Opposed Weapon
Skill/Melee or Dodge Test. If is wins, the target loses 1d10 + SL Wounds without AP or TB modification. The attack counts as Magical.
object.name: Chill Grasp

object.description: Gain +20 Int and +10 I.
object.name: Clever

object.description: Can reverse all failed WP Tests.
object.name: Cold-blooded

object.description: Targets gets an Entangled Condition on every successful hit. The creature can then enter a Grapple.
object.name: Constrictor

object.description: The creature is a magical construct. It has no Int, WP, or Fel. Without wizard controlling it, it has no Territorial Trait. For the purpose of calculating its Wounds, it uses its SB whenever WB is required. All its attacks are Magical.
object.name: Construct

object.description: Every time the creature is Wounded, all Engaged targets take 1d10 Wounds reduced by TB and AP (minimum 1).
object.name: Corrosive Blood

object.description: Creature is a source of Corruption with strength 1.
object.name: Corruption 1

object.description: Gain +10 Fel, +10 Int, and +10 I.
object.name: Cunning

object.description: Create can is in the dark.
object.name: Dark Vision

object.description: Create does not require food, drink, etc. All attacks are Magical. Every time it is hit, roll 1d10, if the roll is equal higher that Target number, the hit is ignored. When wounds are reduced to 0, the creature disappears.
object.name: Daemonic

object.description: All Critical Wounds can be healed. After death, for TB Rounds, it can attempt a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test at the start of each Round. If successful, the creature comes back to life wit 1 Wound.
object.name: Die Hard

object.description: The creature has the Black Plague.
object.name: Disease - The Black Plague

object.description: All living targets withing TB yards suffer -20 to all Tests. Does not stack if there are multiple Distracting creatures around.
object.name: Distracting

object.description: Gain +20 to WS, BS, and WP.
object.name: Elite

object.description: The creature is insubstantial. It can pass through solid objects and can be damaged only by Magical attacks.
object.name: Ethereal

object.description: Gain  +1 Movement and +10 Ag.
object.name: Fast

object.description: Causes Fear 1 in other creatures.
object.name: Fear 1

object.description: The creature can fly up to 10 yards (as a Move). When flying, it gets -20 penalty to all ranged combat. See detailed rules in WFRP p. 339
object.name: Flight 10

object.description: Creature can enter Frenzy
object.name: Frenzy

object.description: For 1 Advantage, the creature can become subject to Hatred to close combat opponents. For 3 Advantage, it can become subject to Frenzy and lose all Advantage.
object.name: Fury

object.description: For 2 Advantage, the creature howls and loses all Advantage. All living targets within Initiative yards gain Deafened Conditions and suffer 1d10 Wounds ignoring TB and AP. They must also pass an Average (+20) Endurance Test or gain a Broken Condition.
object.name: Ghostly Howl

object.description: Creature gains benefits of Hardy Talent.
object.name: Hardy

object.description:
At the beginning of the turn, if its current Advantage is less than 1 and it is not Surprised, Unconscious, or Entangled, its Advantage increases to 1.
If using the Group Advantage rules from Up in Arms, the creature generates Advantage for the Adversary Advantage Pool.
object.name: Grim 1

object.description: Creature hates Elves.
object.name: Hatred - Elves

object.description: When the creature has Advantage for Charging, it may make a Free Attack with its Horns and deal 1 Damage (without adding SB).
object.name: Horns 1

object.description: The creature must pass t pass a Average (+20) Willpower Test or it will try to eat a fresh or incapacitated body, losing next Move and Action.
object.name: Hungry

object.description: This creature is completely immune to Poison Damage.
object.name: Immunity Poision

object.description: This creature is completely immune to Fire Damage.
object.name: Immunity Fire

object.description: This creature ignores the Psychology rules.
object.name: Immunity to Psychology

object.description: On every attack that causes loss of Wounds, the victim has to pass an Easy (+40) Endurance Test or contract a Festering Wound.
object.name: Infected

object.description: All enemies suffer -10 to hit it in melee combat.
object.name: Infestation

object.description: Gain +10 to Fellowship and Willpower.
object.name: Leader

object.description: Creature's attacks count as Magical.
object.name: Magical

object.description: Reduces SL of any spell affecting the creature by 1.
object.name: Magic Resistance 1

object.description: Creature gains a random Mental Mutation.
object.name: Mental Corruption

object.description: Creature can enact Rhya Miriacles.
object.name: Miracles - Rhya

object.description: Creature gains a random Physical Mutation.
object.name: Mutation

object.description: Creature gains a Night Vision Talent.
object.name: Night Vision

object.description: Creature ignores all non-amputation penalties from Critical Wounds. Conditions are suffered as normal.
object.name: Painless

object.description: Cost all Advantage Points (minimum 1). Perform Opposed Ballistic Skill/Initiative Test (or Language Magick instead of Initiative). Add 1 SL per Advantage spent. Inflicts 1 Stunned Condition per 2 SL. If the creature wins by 6 or more SL, the target is permanently turned  into stone.
object.name: Petrifying Gaze

object.description: Creature does not like Elves.
object.name: Prejudice - Elves

object.description: Creature has a ranged weapon that deals 1 Damage.
object.name: Ranged 1

object.description: If the creature is larger than its opponent, it can make a Stomp attack as its Move and deal SB Damage.
object.name: Rear

object.description: If the creature has more than 0 Wounds, at the beginning of each turn, it regenerates 1d10 Wounds. If it has 0 Wounds, it can regenerate 1 Wound if it rolls 8+ on 1d10. On every 10 roll it can regenerate 1 Critical Wound. Wounds (normal and Critical) caused by fire cannot be regenerated.
object.name: Regenerate

object.description: Gets easily startle by Magic or loud noises. If that happens, it receives +3 Broken Conditions.
object.name: Skittish

object.description: Create can cast spells from the Lore of Fire.
object.name: Spellcaster - Lore of Fire

object.description: Add Ag Bonus to all Stealth Tests.
object.name: Stealthy

object.description: Creature size is Small. See detailed rules in WFRP p. 341
object.name: Size - Small

object.description: Creature size is Large. See detailed rules in WFRP p. 341
object.name: Size - Large

object.description: Creature size is Little. See detailed rules in WFRP p. 341
object.name: Size - Little

object.description: Creature size is Tiny. See detailed rules in WFRP p. 341
object.name: Size - Tiny

object.description: Creature size is Enormous. See detailed rules in WFRP p. 341
object.name: Size - Enormous

object.description: Creature size is Monstrous. See detailed rules in WFRP p. 341
object.name: Size - Monstrous

object.description: Running speed is increased by 50%.
object.name: Stride

object.description: If the creature is not near allies without this Trait, it must pass an Easy (+40) Intelligence Test at the start of each round. If it fails, it loses both its Move and Action for that Turn.
object.name: Stupid

object.description: Creature does not suffer Movement penalties when moving through swamp.
object.name: Swamp-strider

object.description: The swarm counts a a single Creature. Ignores Psychology, Size, and Engaged rules when moving. Successful attacks against the opponent trigger Deathblow rule. All engaged opponents lose 1 Wound every Round. The swarm has 5 times more Wounds than a single creature and +10 WS. Ranged attacks against the swarm have +40 to hit.
object.name: Swarm

object.description: For 1 Advantage, the creature attacks with its tail as Free Attack. Does 1 Damage. If the opponent is smaller and suffers at least 1 Wound, it also gains a Prone Condition.
object.name: Tail Attack 1

object.description: The creature has 2 tentacles. It gains one Free Attack Action per tentacle, which does 1 damage. If the tentacle attack causes at least 1 Wound, the target is receives Entangled Condition. To resolve Grapple, use tentacle's Free Attack Action.
object.name: 2 Tentacle 1

object.description: The creature will fight to the death to protect its territory and will not chase anything beyond it.
object.name: Territorial

object.description: The creature causes Terror 1.
object.name: Terror 1

object.description:
Animal has been trained using Animal Training Skill.
Broken - ignores Bestial, gains 2d10 Fel.
object.name: Trained - Broken

object.description:
Animal has been trained using Animal Training Skill.
Drive - trained to pull a cart , coach, etc.
object.name: Trained - Drive

object.description:
Animal has been trained using Animal Training Skill.
Entertain -  gets +10 to Entertain, Perform or Play Tests.
object.name: Trained - Entertain

object.description:
Animal has been trained using Animal Training Skill.
Fetch - can fetch small items on command.
object.name: Trained - Fetch

object.description:
Animal has been trained using Animal Training Skill.
Guard - gains Territorial Trait.
object.name: Trained - Guard

object.description:
Animal has been trained using Animal Training Skill.
Home - trained to return home if lost.
object.name: Trained - Home

object.description:
Animal has been trained using Animal Training Skill.
Home - ignores Skittish when it comes to magic.
object.name: Trained - Magic

object.description:
Animal has been trained using Animal Training Skill.
Mount - can be mounted by a rider with correct skill.
object.name: Trained - Mount

object.description:
Animal has been trained using Animal Training Skill.
War - Gains +10 WS and ignores Skittish when it comes to loud noises.
object.name: Trained - War

object.description: For 1 Advantage, the creature makes a Free Attack that deals 1 Damage and has range of 5 yards. If the target is hit, it receives 1 Entangled Condition. If the opponents is smaller it is also dragged towards the creature. In this case, the creature can either release it, Grapple, or do a Free Attack using its Weapon Trait.
object.name: Tongue Attack 1 (5)

object.description: Gain +10 to T and WP.
object.name: Tough

object.description: Add Initiative Bonus to SLs of all Track Tests.
object.name: Tracker

object.description: Creature is an Undead.
object.name: Undead

object.description: At the end of every Round, if the creature has Advantage lower that any creature it is engaged with, it loses number of Wounds equal to the difference between its Advantage, and the highest Advantage engaged with it.
object.name: Unstable

object.description: On successful Bite attack, heal number of Wounds equal to the number of Wounds lost by the target. This is the only way the creature can heal.
object.name: Vampiric

object.description: When the creature causes any Wound, the target receives 1 Poisoned Condition that requires Challenging (+0) Endurance Test to remove.
object.name: Venom Challenging

object.description: For 3 Advantage, perform a Fee Attack against 1 opponent within TB yards. All creatures within 2 yards are also affected. The creature performs an Opposed Ballistic Skill/Dodge Test against each target. The Test is Easy (+40) for the creature and Challenging (+0) for the targets. Losing opponents are hit with TB +4 Damage, receive Stunned Condition, and all Armour and Weapon suffer 1 Damage due to Corrosion.
object.name: Vomit

object.description: Roll 1d10 after any blow. If the creatures rolls 10, it ignores all Damage.
object.name: Ward 10

object.description: Can move at full speed on any wall or ceiling. Automatically passes all Climb Tests.
object.name: Wallcrawler

object.description: Creature can make melee attacks that cause 5 Damage (already includes SB).
object.name: Weapon 5

object.description: On every successful hit, the opponent receives 1 Entangled Condition with strength 1.
object.name: Web 1

object.description: Creature can move by tunneling underground up to 30 yards.  See detailed rules in Imperial Zoo p. 23
object.name: Burrow 30

object.description:
At the end of the Round, if the creature has a higher Advantage than all engaged opponents, it absorbs one opponent of equal Size or smaller. The victim receives number of Entangled Conditions equal to creatures SB and is in a Grapple. Each Round (at the end), the absorbed victim loses Wounds equal to creatures TB and the creature heals TB Wounds. Any attack that hits the creature do the same Damage to the absorbed victim.
If the absorbed victim is killed, the creature retreats to digest the corpse for the next few days.
object.name: Absorb

object.description: Creature is a shapeless blob. Reduce by half all Damage not caused by fire, cold, or magic. It cannot be Critically Wounded. If reduced to 0 Wounds, it becomes dormant for 1d10 Rounds, then regenerates +1 Wound.
object.name: Amorphous

object.description: If the creature touches the victim, they have to pass a Contraction Test that is 2 steps more Difficult than normal. If the disease is contracted, its Incubation is changed to Instant.
object.name: Blighted - The Black Plague

object.description: Requires Daemonic Trait as well. The creature can prepare and wear flesh of any Human it kills. This allows it to perfectly impersonate the victim. Detailed rules in Enemy in Shadows p. 148.
object.name: Fleshthief

object.description: The creature is completely mindless. It does not have Initiative, Intelligence, Willpower, or Fellowship. For Wounds calculations use S Bonus instead of WP Bonus. It always takes it Turn last in and Round.
object.name: Mindless

object.description: When the creature loses all its Wounds or  suffers a Critical Wound, it is replaced by two Blue Horrors.
object.name: Split

object.description: All creatures of the same type in the vicinity pool their power. One Horror becomes a caster and can cast 1 Tzeentch Spell during their Round. Pink Horrors cast the Pink Fire of Tzeentch; other creatures cast the Blue Fire of Tzeentch. Each additional creature adds +1 SL up to +9 SL.
object.name: Tzeentch's Fire

object.description: Creatures bite does not cause pain, it can attach undetected. The effect wears off 10 - T Bonus Rounds after the creature detaches.
object.name: Analgesic Saliva

object.description: Creature's bite causes 1 Bleeding Condition.
object.name: Anticoagulant Saliva

object.description: Creature can breath under water, can move in water at full speed. Cannot move on land.
object.name: Aquatic

object.description: Creature can attach itself to the victim and suck blood. See detailed rules in Death on the Reik Companion p. 90.
object.name: Attach and Feed

object.description: When making Fellowship Test to deal with this creature, roll 1d10. 1: -2SL, 2-3: -1SL, 4-7: no effect, 8-9: +1 SL, 10: +2 SL.
object.name: Capricious

object.description: Cannot run.
object.name: Creeping

object.description: Any successful attack engulfs the victim. Details in Death on the Reik Companion p. 90.
object.name: Engulf

object.description: Anyone within 2 yards must pass an Average (+20) Willpower Test or they receive 1 Stunned Condition for each level of failure.
object.name: Hallucinogen

object.description: Animal Familiar can communicate with its spirit-bonded spellcaster using telepathy. Works at a distance of up to 4 yards.
object.name: Animal Telepathy

object.description: Animal Familiar deliver messages up to its Intelligence miles in distance.
object.name: Messenger

object.description: The spirit-bonded spellcaster can see, hear, and smell through the senses  the Animal Familiar.
object.name: Sensory Sharing

object.description: Animal Familiar can become invisible once per day. It lasts WP Bonus hours and cannot be deactivated early.  Perception Tests to notice the familiar are Very Hard (-30). When hiding, it can only be spotted by characters with the Magical Sense Talent.
object.name: Invisibility

object.description: Cyclopean eye of Fimir gives them Second Sight Talent. All Second Sight Tests for Skill Tests gain +2 SL. Language (Magick) and Channelling Test gain +1 SL. When the creature suffers a Miscast, they make a Difficult (-10) Perception Test. If they succeed, the spell still fails but they do not suffer miscast effects.
object.name: Bale Eye

object.description:
For 2 Advantage activate Breath Free Attack. Target 1 opponent within 20+TB yards. All characters within SB yards and all characters between the on the path to the target are struck. Perform an Opposed Ballistic Skill/Dodge Test against all affected targets. Whoever fails, takes 1 Damage. 
Warpfire effect: details in Empire in Ruins Companion p. 21.
object.name: Breath Warpfire 1

object.description: Creature can send its thoughts directly to minds of others. It can also read their minds. To resist, they must pass an Average (+20) Cool Test.
object.name: Telepathy

object.description: Creature can change colour to blend with environment better. All Perception Tests to spot it suffer -4 SL it it is still and -2 SL if it is moving. Ranged Tests to shoot at the creature also suffer -2 SL.
object.name: Chameleon

object.description:
Marked by the Chotec, chosen for a great destiny. Unique to Lizardmen.
Gain +10 I and Ag.
Gain Combat Reflexes Talent.
object.name: Marks of Chotec

object.description:
Marked by the Huanchi, chosen for a great destiny. Unique to Skink and Saurus.
Gain +5 I and +10 Ag.
Gain Shadow Talent.
Gain Dark Vision and Stealthy Traits.
object.name: Marks of Huanchi

object.description:
Marked by the Itzl, chosen for a great destiny. Unique to Skink and Saurus.
Gain +5 I and Fel.
Gain Animal Affinity Talent.
object.name: Marks of Itzl

object.description:
Marked by the Quetzl, chosen for a great destiny. Unique to Lizardmen.
Gain +5 T and +1 Armour.
Gain Implacable Talent.
Gain Hardy Trait.
object.name: Marks of Quetzl

object.description:
Marked by the Sotek, chosen for a great destiny. Unique to Lizardmen.
Gain +10 WS and +5 S.
Gain Berserk Charge Talents.
Gain Hatred - Skaven and Immunity - Poison Trait.
object.name: Marks of Sotek

object.description:
Marked by the Tepok, chosen for a great destiny. Unique to Skink and Saurus.
Gain +5 I and +15 Int.
Gain Sixth Sense Talent.
Gain Magic Resistance 1 Trait.
object.name: Marks of Tepok

object.description:
Marked by the Tlazcotl, chosen for a great destiny. Unique to Lizardmen.
Gain +10 WP.
Gain Fearless - Undead and Fearless - Warm-bloods Talents.
object.name: Marks of Tlazcotl

object.description:
Marked by the Tzunki, chosen for a great destiny. Unique to Lizardmen.
Gain +5 BS and Ag.
Gain Acute Sense - Sight Talent.
Gain Amphibious Trait.
object.name: Marks of Tzunki

object.description:
Marked by the the Old Ones, chosen for a great destiny. Unique to Skink and Saurus.
Gain +15 Fel.
Gain Luck Talent.
Gain Leader Trait.
object.name: Marks of the Old Ones

object.description: The Daemon can make a Challenging (+0) WP Test. On success it summons 1d10 lesser daemons appropriate to its god. If the Daemon takes any wound, it must pass an Average (+20) Cool Test to be able to summon again. It can attempt the Test every Round. On Impressive Failure, it loses this ability completely.
object.name: Living Gate

object.description: Can move at full speed in water. When out of the water, their Movement drops to 1, and receive -2 SL to all Tests. They also need to be doused with water or they will begin to suffocate.
object.name: Marine Creature

object.description: Creature gains Frenzy and Etiquette - Followers of Khorne Talents. It suffers from Animosity towards followers of Slaanesh (and other way around if they can see the Mark). It can never use Language - Magick or Channeling skills unless to dispel a spell.
object.name: Mark of Khorne

object.description: Animal Familiar Trait. When the Familiar is within 4 yards, the spirit-bonded spellcaster has access to the following Talents (or get +1 SL if they already have it): Blather, Schemer
object.name: Deception - Fox

object.description: Animal Familiar Trait. When the Familiar is within 4 yards, the spirit-bonded spellcaster has access to the following Talents (or get +1 SL if they already have it): Holy Visions, Sixth Sense
object.name: Divination - Owl

object.description: Animal Familiar Trait. When the Familiar is within 4 yards, the spirit-bonded spellcaster has access to the following Talents (or get +1 SL if they already have it): Hunters Eye, Shadowing
object.name: Perception - Stoat

object.description: Animal Familiar Trait. When the Familiar is within 4 yards, the spirit-bonded spellcaster has access to the following Talents (or get +1 SL if they already have it): Robust, Tenacious
object.name: Resilience - Badger

object.description: Animal Familiar Trait. When the Familiar is within 4 yards, the spirit-bonded spellcaster has access to the following Talents (or get +1 SL if they already have it):  Alley Cat, Rover
object.name: Stealth - Cat

object.description: Animal Familiar Trait. When the Familiar is within 4 yards, the spirit-bonded spellcaster has access to the following Talents (or get +1 SL if they already have it):  Nose for Trouble, Master of Disguise
object.name: Transformation - Crow

object.description: Whenever creature's immediate circumstances undergo a change they must pass an Easy (+40) Intelligence Test or receive 1 Stunned Condition. Each Round, they can attempt a new Easy (+40) Intelligence Test to remove this Condition.
object.name: Easily Confused

object.description: Creature receives -20 to all Tests to avoid Ablaze Condition. Suffers double Wounds from Ablaze Condition.
object.name: Flammable

object.description: Creature has Immunity to Psychology. It cannot take actions beside those which are associated with its attacks and Traits. Its reach depends on the size: Tiny or Little: Very Short, Small: Short, Average: Medium, Large: Long, Enormous: Very Long, Monstrous: Massive.
object.name: Stationary Attacker

object.description: If the creature does not have enough Advantage to use its Breath Trait, roll a d10. On a roll of 8 or more it may do so anyway.
object.name: Font of Flame

object.description: Unique to the Changeling Of Tzeentch. Once per Round, it can change to any typical creature or specific one if it studied it for a number of hours equal to the creatures Intelligence Bonus. It gains access to all creature's Traits. When impersonating a specific creature it does not gain access to its memories.
object.name: Formless Horror

object.description: The creature gain 1d10/3 Mutations (rounded up, alternating between Physical and Mental) from table on p. 66 in Enemy in Shadows Companion. It gains Etiquette - Followers of Tzeentch Talent and Animosity towards followers of Nurgle (an other way around if the Mark is visible).
object.name: Mark of Tzeentch

object.description: Creature has a gift that allows it to see flaws in everything: organizations, objects, people. If it studies an opponent in combat for its Action, on the following Action, its attack ignores both Toughness Bonus and Armour Points.
object.name: Piercing Gaze

object.description: When attacked, the creature can cast spells from a random Lore. The Lore changes every Round. To determine the Lore, see table on p. 214 in Winds of magic or p. 18 in Empire in Ruins Companion.
object.name: Random Caster

object.description: This creature can shift at will between its regular form and a Great Cat. See detailed rules in Enemy in Shadows Companion p. 87.
object.name: Shapeshifter - Great Cat

object.description: Whenever a spell is cast, the creature can make an Opposed Willpower Test with the caster. If it succeeds, roll 1d10. 1-2: no effect, 3-7: the creature casts spell instead of the caster, 8-9: both creature and caster cast the spell, 10: both caster and the creature are in the centre of a Blast 5, Damage 6 explosion.
object.name: Spell Syphon

object.description: If the vampire wins an Opposed Willpower/Cool Test, the target comes under the Vampires control. The effects lasts for 1+SL hours. Controlled targets may attempt an Average (+20) Cool Test if forced to do something they would normally find morally or physically repugnant.
object.name: Vampiric Gaze

object.description:
Can be activated as Free Attack by spending 2 Advantage. Choose 1 target it can see within 20 + TB yards. It makes an Opposed Ballistic Skill/Dodge Test against
all creatures within SB yards of that target (the breathing creature single roll Opposed by each individual target). Losing targets take Damage equal to the attacks rating, ignoring Armour, and gain an Ablaze Condition, a Blinded Condition, and two Poisoned Conditions. The Creature is immune to their own Breath. This attack is magical.
object.name: Breath (Brimstone Fire)

object.description: Creature's Bite Attack benefits from the Entangling Quality.
object.name: Distendable Jaws

object.description: If the creature looses its teeth, they will grow back in 1d10 days.
object.name: Replaceable Teeth
